registry_path.description: Path to term registry JSONL file (e.g., out/a2_registry/terms.jsonl)

now_iso.description: Optional ISO timestamp override for 'now' (defaults to current UTC time)

max_terms.description: Maximum number of terms to process

min_obs.description: Minimum number of observations required per term

seed.description: Optional deterministic seed (unused for computation, kept for consistency)
